caption.title: DNA concentrations in mudstone matrix and bone quantified with Qubit fluorometry.

tr.th: DNA per 1 g of bone or mudstone (ng/g)

tr.td: Matrix-surrounded subterranean Centrosaurus bone core (surface scraped prior to powdering)
Adjacent mudstone matrix of subterranean Centrosaurus bone

fn.p: *Note: the detection limit corresponds to the actual concentration of DNA in the assay tube (0.0005 ng/µL) after 200 times dilution of the original sample according to the manufacturer’s protocol.
